author: jrpc_jeremi
content: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/591#issue-1327881298 - can someone review my findings please? Why can I store less data in a smart contract if I use array of uint8's compared to raw strings?

author: _shemnon
content: Wrong discord, this is for protocol development.  For help using solidity and the EVM try the CryptoDevs discord - https://discord.com/invite/5W5tVb3

author: jrpc_jeremi
content: It's not help using solidity, it's reporting a bug in EVM

author: _shemnon
content: This isn't an EVM issue, Solidity could support packed uint8 arrays.

author: jrpc_jeremi
content: OK, thank you for your help.
